Full moon party, arts and crafts fair and Motu tramp on in Tairāwhiti Gisborne this weekend https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/full-moon-party-arts-and-crafts-fair-and-motu-tramp-on-in-tairawhiti-gisborne-this-weekend/ WR6Z373RQFEVFBPY2PS5LVQFXI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/full-moon-party-arts-and-crafts-fair-and-motu-tramp-on-in-tairawhiti-gisborne-this-weekend/ WR6Z373RQFEVFBPY2PS5LVQFXI/ Kim ParkinsonWhat's on in Gisborne this weekend: Full moon party, arts & craft fair and Motu tramp. Wed, 08 Jan 2025 22:29:46 +0000 Brazilbeat Sound System's DJ Mara and Nego Beto on percussion will play at the annual Full Moon Party at Smash Palace on Saturday. The Full Moon Party has been bringing the community together with local DJs and performers every summer since 2017.
